Key Match Events: Qatar scored three goals with contributions from Mashaal, Moez Ali, and Abdurisag
India had several chances but couldn't score
Qatar's confidence and India's struggle in front of goal were key
Pre-Game Insights: Arsene Wenger advised India to play with more tempo and improve marking
Carlos Queiroz highlighted the difficulty of playing in India
India was without key players due to injuries
Post-Match Reflections: India's performance was disappointing despite efforts
Coach Igor Stimac's work was noted by players
The match was significant for Qatar's World Cup preparations
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was sold out at Kalinga Stadium
Previous encounter between India and Qatar was mentioned
